name: runna
description: Runna - process based task runner for Node
author: Michal Kochel

scripts.build:fail:log: node index.js [ clean - generate:plain generate:flavor fail:log ] -f blue,red
scripts.build:fail:throw: node index.js [ clean - generate:plain generate:flavor fail:throw ] -f blue,red
scripts.build:fail:exit: node index.js [ clean - generate:plain generate:flavor fail:exit ] -f blue,red
scripts.build: node index.js [ clean - generate:plain generate:flavor ] -f blue,red
scripts.dev: node index.js [ +background clean - generate:plain generate:flavor ] -w .. -f blue,red
